title: Relief Fragment of Two Men in Profile
description:
Small limestone flake with the heads and shoulders of two men in low relief. Above their heads is the base of a register containing hieroglyphs. The workmanship is good although it is very small.
Condition: Faint traces of red paint on one headdress, left side of relief missing.
credit_line: Gift of the Egypt Exploration Society

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
